title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Rural Financial Intermediation Programme

description.narrative: The overall goal of the programme is to alleviate poverty, increase income and contribute to the overall economic development. The programme objective is to enhance, on a sustainable basis, the rural poor''s access to efficient financial services.

name.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Rural Financial Intermediation Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
